thread.section_title: Greyhours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greyhours | greyhours.com
thread.title: Douglas Luke

author: Douglas Luke
title: Douglas Luke
text: I bought the watch around 6 months ago and was delighted the quality and feel of not just the watch itself, but the packaging and instructions. It seems the company wants every detail of ownership to feel very premium. I have been very pleased with the watch since then and find it very versatile for casual and formal wear. I also had to use the online chat function for assistance and found them to be extremely prompt and helpful in resolving a small issue which was mostly of my making!
